m_szDocTitle: UK to show more support for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles | Hydrogen Fuel News
m_szDocSumamry: Categorized | International , Featured News , Hydrogen Fuel Cell UK to show more support for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles Share on Tumblr Department for Transport will be adding more money to the country’s clean transportation grant program The United Kingdom’s Department for Transport is looking to boost the adoption of electric vehicles, particularly those powered by hydrogen fuel, and has begun offering more money for those purchasing these vehicles.
